items.question: How long does MVP development take?
items.answer: Depending on complexity, usually 4-12 weeks. We'll provide a more accurate estimate after the diagnosis session.

items.question: Do I need to be technically savvy?
items.answer: No. We handle all technical aspects. You just need to share your ideas and business needs.

items.question: How does the payment process work?
items.answer: Payments are made in stages (milestone-based), so you can see progress before paying for the next phase.

items.question: Is there maintenance after launch?
items.answer: Yes, we provide maintenance and support packages after launch to ensure your product runs optimally.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We use modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and trusted cloud infrastructure.

items.question: What if I only have a rough idea?
items.answer: That's exactly what we help with! Starting from a free project diagnosis, we'll help you refine your idea into an actionable plan.

items.question: Do I own the source code?
items.answer: Yes, all source code and assets we create are fully yours after the project is completed.
